entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
